description.value: Character can use their Willpower Characteristic when making Evasion Reactions against Ranged or Melee Psychic Attacks, and is not required to move when avoiding area of effect psychic attacks.

system.benefit: Character can use their Willpower Characteristic when making Evasion Reactions against Ranged or Melee Psychic Attacks, and is not required to move when avoiding area of effect psychic attacks.
